name: Evangelos E. Milios
content: Evangelos E. Milios Evangelos E. Milios Dipl. Eng. ElecEng, NTUA, Greece (1980) S.M., E.E. M.I.T. (1983), Ph.D. M.I.T. (1986) Killam Chair in Computer Science (2006-2011) (Killam Trusts) Distinguished Research Professor (2017-2022) DeepSense Scientific Director (2017-2022) Senior Member of the IEEE Professional Engineer (Ontario). (1998/11-2024/08) Address: Faculty of Computer Science, Dalhousie University, Paramount Building, Room 3047 1577 Barrington Street Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada Personal Home Page: http://www.cs.dal.ca/~eem email: (for research and personal) (only for Dalhousie administration & DeepSense) Phone: 902-494-7111 Fax: 902-492-1517 Skype: evangelosmilios Office: Google Calendar (choose week tab) Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/evangelos-milios-2973685/ Google Scholar: https://tinyurl.com/e-milios Semantic Scholar: https://www.semanticscholar.org/author/Evangelos-E.-Milios/1736641 ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5549-4675 Research Interests: Visual Text Analytics, Modelling and Mining of Networked Information Spaces, Text Mining, Graph Mining, Social Network Analysis. Short biography Research Teaching Administration Affiliations Machine Learning and Networked Information Spaces (MALNIS) Institute of Big Data Analytics DeepSense Graduate resources Information for prospective applicants to join the MALNIS research group (post-Master and post-Bachelor Ph.D. positions available only) Reference letter requests Information for TA/marker applicants (Dal CS students only) Wikimedia Foundation Aug. 1, 2019
